channel.title: Skateboarding | post your deck
channel.description:
Do you guys skateboard? What deck do you guys ride? what's your best trick? What do you prefer, street or vert? Let me know because all I do I skate and was wondering how much of the community of the skateboards.
Post a picture of your skateboard deck! Here's mine [img]http://t0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTBlFQDJVRKqmUWegUZ5hZcCNzZ6ZbjrehRBpgOGiYOMYcuGzAZdA[/img]
I'm more vert, my best trick is a nollie tre flip or nollie varial heel flip

item.title: Skateboarding | post your deck
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

AtomicInt_:

Street, I’ve only been to a skate park once, and I didn’t like it too much, too crowded, had to wear knee pads, elbow pads, helmets, etc. and street is free. Haha.

I’ve never been a Skateboarder, but to my knowledge, not all Skate Parks are like this.

Read full topic

item.title: Skateboarding | post your deck
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

AtomicInt_:

It’s a 3 hour drive for me, too. I live in Ohio.

will sign yo ass up we shredding this summer

heres a picture I took from this summer week 4

item.title: Skateboarding | post your deck
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:50, topic:458070”][quote author=KroniKz_ link=topic=560993.msg4103132#msg4103132 date=1347727815]

Street, I’ve only been to a skate park once, and I didn’t like it too much, too crowded, had to wear knee pads, elbow pads, helmets, etc. and street is free. Haha.

oh I went to woodward this summer, I hope you know what that is
I hated that woodward enforces those rules. My skatepark just makes us wear helmets, and only on certain days you have to worry about little scooter kids there, other than that my skatepark is just cool skaters who spend there life there. I go like 3 times a week if i can. I have grind rails at home so I can do that in free time! You should really go to woodward, we can skate together at the camp and be like the 2 moparians… well if you don’t know what woodward is its a skate camp and its like super famous, it was on nitro circus.
[/quote]
Isn’t that in Georgia?[/quote]
PA, its a 3 hour drive for me, im in new jersey. They also have one in cali

Read full topic

item.title: Skateboarding | post your deck
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“KroniKz_, post:45, topic:458070”][quote author=vManlyMan link=topic=560993.msg4103086#msg4103086 date=1347723938]

It’s been over two years since I’ve even seen this skateboard. (It’s been almost two years since I joined mopar too. coincidence?) Honestly, I can’t remember anything about the board. Not even the brand who makes it, or else I’d just take a picture of it when it’s not all scratched up off Google.

also, sorry about picture quality. Took it with an iPod.
[/quote]
from what I’m seeing it might be an element or deathwish. judging from the logo in the middle thats barely visible, but yea im pretty sure that an element.[/quote]

Yes! It was an element. And the only reason it’s not really visible is because the day I successfully grinded, (ground?), the first time, that was all I did for 3 weeks. I also had a flip way back in the day, but I think I left that at my house when I moved.

Read full topic

item.title: Skateboarding | post your deck
item.dc:creator: @Teemo Teemo
item.description:
@Teemo wrote:

Very cool! I like that board! Fakie Varials are fun off a 6 set or something i got clipped on one like 2 years ago lol
[/quote]
Yeah. It has amazing pop and it’s actually pretty light for an 8.0. And yes they are. I can’t even ollie a 6 set. xD

Read full topic

item.title: Skateboarding | post your deck
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“Teemo, post:41, topic:458070”]Yep, Guy Mariano, It took awhile to find this on google, I would take a picture but my SD card just got stuck in my camera. xD
Best trick: Fakie Varial Kickflip, Kickflip Sexchange, or frontside flip. (kickflip 180.)
[/quote]
Very cool! I like that board! Fakie Varials are fun off a 6 set or something i got clipped on one like 2 years ago lol

Read full topic

lmfao

it’s so fun hah

Whats ur best trick?

Probably a Nollie Shove It or a Varial Heelflip, you?[/quote]
nollie tre
im working on a double heel, I know a nollie tre seems alot harder then a double heel, but I can barely get one… Stupid heel lmfao… Are you more street or vert? I really like ramps and stuff, getting speed and air is awesome.
